user_agent: Code compilation bot tester /u/<your reddit username>
error_text: There was an error processing your comment.

text.help_text:
CompileBot is a reddit bot that can execute source code in comments. All you have to do is mention CompileBot in your comments along with a language and source code:

> +/u/CompileBot python>
>     print "Hello World!">
CompileBot will then process your comment, execute it remotely, and then respond with the output:
> Output:
>
>     Hello World!
>

You can find out more about how to use compile bot, why it exists, the languages it supports and its source code all from the the [CompileBot Wiki](http://www.reddit.com/r/CompileBot/wiki/)
text.error_preamble: There was an error processing your comment: {link}
text.error_postamble:
You can edit your original comment and have it [recompiled](http://www.reddit.com/r/CompileBot/wiki/index#wiki_recompiling) by replying to this message with the following:

--recompile {link}
text.format_error_text:
CompileBot could not process your comment's formatting. The following is an example of a correctly formatted CompileBot submission:

+/u/CompileBot python

    print "Hello World"

Common Errors: 

* Note that the font of the source code is preformatted. This means **you must indent each line of source code with four spaces**. (This can easily be done with RES by selecting the "Code" option above the reply box).

* There must be a blank line in between the line with "+/u/CompileBot" and the source code.

* Don't forget to enter a language. This must go immediately after the "+/u/CompileBot".



Refer to the [formatting guide](http://www.reddit.com/r/CompileBot/wiki/index#wiki_how_to_use_compilebot) for more info.
text.language_error_text:
The language you requested ("{lang}"), was not found. Perhaps you meant one of the following: {choices}.

A list of supported languages is available on the [CompileBot Wiki](http://www.reddit.com/r/CompileBot/wiki/index#wiki_supported_languages)
text.compile_error_text:
An error occurred during the compilation of the included source code.

If you would like the output of these errors to be included in a reply to your comment, you can include the "**--include-errors**" [option](http://www.reddit.com/r/CompileBot/wiki/index#wiki_options) when creating your request.
text.runtime_error_text: An error occurred during the execution of the included source code If you would like the output of these errors to be included in a reply to your comment, you can include the "**--include-errors**" [option](http://www.reddit.com/r/CompileBot/wiki/index#wiki_options) when creating your request.
text.timeout_error_text: Your program took too long to run. Programs are only allowed to compile for a maximum of 10 seconds and run for a maximum of 5 seconds.
text.memory_error_text: Your program used too much memory. Programs are only allowed to use up to 256 MB of memory.
text.illegal_error_text: Your program attempted to use a restricted system function.
text.internal_error_text: There has been an internal error caused by ideone's compilation servers. Please wait an try again.
text.recompile_error_text: There was an error processing you recompilation request. Make sure your message contains "--recompile" followed by a valid comment permalink. [View more details on recompiling here](http://www.reddit.com/r/CompileBot/wiki/index#wiki_recompiling).
text.recompile_author_error_text: You can only request to recompile your own comments.
